thread.title: Samantha Williams

author: Samantha Williams
title: Samantha Williams
text: I don't have a printer so relied upon the option to have the paperwork sent to me which I received within a couple of days and promptly sent off my mobile using the instructions and label provided. I received an email once they had it in their possession and my money was paid into my account the same day as they received it before 2 p.m. I was paid the full amount promised which I know some companies try to get out of. I would say definitely definitely try music magpie to sell off unwanted tech because they offer a very fair price, pay promptly and make the whole process completely painless.
